title: The Nuder Detective
description: The Booker Stone Detective Agency is blackmailed into helping the matriarch of the assassin’s cult that recently tried to kill them. Their task is to locate Moi Lei, the matriarch’s daughter, who does not want to be rescued. In a strange twist, Moi Lei saves them, and they learn of supernatural powers wielded by two very different groups.The intriguing cast of characters from Book 1 join forces again and this time they need additional talents and brains. Sinister, centuries old, supernatural cults stalk their every step. Soon only their mobility can keep Ethan’s team alive. They find an unlikely ally with powers of their own and utilise the world’s best scientists to unravel the mystery and powers of the clans who hunt them.As pressure from the killers mounts to a fever pitch, the desire to make the most of what might be a short life is irresistible, fueling their sexually adventurous natures. as they head towards a showdown of epic proportions.
author: M.J.  Parker
